aws_dms_event_subscription.description: Provides a DMS (Data Migration Service) event subscription resource.

enabled.description: Whether the event subscription should be enabled.

event_categories.description: List of event categories to listen for, see `DescribeEventCategories` for a canonical list.

source_type.description: Type of source for events. Valid values: `replication-instance` or `replication-task`

source_ids.description: Ids of sources to listen to.

sns_topic_arn.description: SNS topic arn to send events on.
